Dewpoint: -9.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls. Amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
